welcome.title: Welcome to TempBin
welcome.subtitle: Let's get you set up with your Cloudflare R2 storage.

step1.title: Account & Bucket
step1.description: Enter your Cloudflare Account ID and the R2 Bucket Name you want to use.

instructions.title: How to find these?
instructions.step1: Log in to your Cloudflare dashboard.
instructions.step2: Navigate to R2 from the sidebar.
instructions.step3: Your Account ID is shown on the right side of the R2 overview page.
instructions.step4: Create a new bucket or use an existing one and copy its name.

step2.title: Credentials
step2.description: Enter your R2 Access Key ID and Secret Access Key.

instructions.title: How to generate keys?
instructions.step1: In the R2 dashboard, click on 'Manage R2 API Tokens' on the right.
instructions.step4: Create the token and copy the Access Key ID and Secret Access Key.

step3.title: Public Access
step3.description: Optionally configure a custom domain for public file access.

instructions.title: Setting up public access
instructions.step1: Go to your bucket settings in the R2 dashboard.
instructions.step2: Under 'Public Access', you can connect a custom domain or allow public access via R2.dev subdomain.
instructions.step3: Enter the full URL (e.g., https://files.example.com) here.

step4.title: Storage Limit
step4.description: Set a storage limit to help manage your R2 usage and costs.

instructions.title: About Storage Limits
instructions.step1: Cloudflare R2 offers a generous free tier (10 GB/month).
instructions.step2: Set a limit here to get warned before you exceed it.
instructions.step3: This is a client-side check only and does not enforce limits on Cloudflare.

step5.title: CORS Setup
step5.description: Configure Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) to allow uploads from this website.

instructions.title: Setting up CORS
instructions.step1: Go to your bucket settings in the R2 dashboard.
instructions.step4: Paste it into the CORS Policy editor and save.

step5.pasteHint: Paste this into your R2 bucket's CORS policy settings.

completion.subtitle: Your R2 storage is configured and ready to use.
